title: Intensive Short-Term English Education Program for Developing Intercultural Communication Competence

context.prior_knowledge: Basic business English knowledge and foundational understanding of multicultural environments
context.additional_context: Teaching competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers. Short-term intensive course for managers/leaders requiring global project management and collaboration with multicultural team members within organizations. Requires content accessible via smartphone-based LMS environment.

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain three or more communication barriers in intercultural contexts through a 13-week ICLT model-based training program.

Learners can execute two or more effective English communication strategies considering cultural contexts by performing role-plays based on business scenarios with partners from diverse cultural backgrounds.
Learners can continuously monitor their intercultural communication skills through formative assessments (quizzes, feedback) and develop improvement plans.

resources: Business English Scenario Materials with Cultural Context
Simple Tool for Voice Recording and Text Feedback
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
